sentence.Network_en: Gambler - Also a bettor or player. Someone that a bet.
sentence.Network_cn: 赌徒 – 亦称做投注者或玩家, 即下了注码的人.

sentence.Network_en: The bettor has hot tips for tomorrow's race.
sentence.Network_cn: 下注者手中有明天比赛的内部消息.

sentence.Network_en: To bet more than ( a preceding bettor in poker ).
sentence.Network_cn: 加注超过他人下赌注超过 ( 扑克牌游戏中前者的赌注 )

list.abs: Chalk Player – A bettor that wagers on favourites and rarely bets on underdogs ., 一位常买热门很少买冷门的博彩客户.
many of the bettors had asked for a draw because they had to go to work on the docks loading sacks of sugar or at the Havana Coal Company .好多打赌的人要求算是和局，因为他们得上码头去干活，把麻袋装的糖装上船，或者上哈瓦那煤行去工作。

auth_sentence.content: He doesn't tell you that the other bettor chose the two horses in the race, and picked one horse with no chance of winning.

auth_sentence.content: "He's probably the most successful soccer bettor in the world, " says Keith Sobey, who oversees a London sports-betting academy.
